A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This Star Wars movie was not in line with any previous films before it in terms of character development\, plot\, force lore and legecy of heros from previous films\, books and animations. The obvious social messages were up front and center instead of used as undertones tactfully as in previous films. Just so many bad things to list. Great visual effects and tidbits of nostalgia. Terrible movie and story telling.
